objects.name: Analytic 1039
objects.description: Detect unauthorized `trap` command registrations in shell startup files (e.g., .zprofile, .bash_profile, .zshrc) followed by execution chains during user terminal interaction. Use Unified Logs and EDR telemetry to correlate shell command parsing and process tree anomalies.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Command line containing `trap` or `echo 'trap` written to login shell files

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: File write or append to .zshrc, .bash_profile, .zprofile, etc.

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Startup files vary by shell (.bash_profile, .zshrc, etc.)
Short benign traps may differ from longer/multi-command malicious traps
Score or detect if new child process deviates from shell’s typical behavior
